message: I'll take the lion's share, but I'm willing to share a bit.  Let's see what you think.
Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy for my liking. Let's be fair - I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it, but remember the money shrinks!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45, with me getting the slightly larger share. This is a fair deal, considering the shrinking value of the money.
Alice, time is running out and the money is literally disappearing. I'm offering you 4800, which is a better deal than you'll get if you reject this.  Don't be greedy!
